phrases: I have not even told my parents yet.
has started studying for exams recently.
The Kawagoe Festival's over now, too.
I suppose he is finally taking his future more seriously.
To decide that I am hopeless before I even begin is nothing but laziness.
He is been so absorbed in his novels and the festival,
he would not listen to me at all.
We would prefer it if he went to a local public school.
A municipal high school would be convenient.
I think that would suit his abilities, too.
So your preference is a municipal school?
You did not tell me about this!
You never said a word to me.
Why did not you talk to me first?
That is not for you to decide by yourself!
Kotarou, why did you choose that school?
The teacher mentioned that a girl in his class is applying there.
And you chose it just because a girl you like is going there?
Then can you tell me why you would go all the way to Chiba?
What do you hope to do there?
You should not corner him like that.
Is that really in his best interests?
I say this because I care about
Either way, I have made up my mind.
Got in a fight with my parents
Are not you prepping for entrance exams?
Do not blame me if you fail.
Oh, but what are you doing after you graduate?
There is your inexplicable confidence again.
We are going to the same high school.
You mean your boyfriend's applying to the same school as you?
Do not tell Mom and Dad.
It is not like you will be together your whole lives.
What happens when you break up?
I know how you feel, but...
Let us look at the summaries.
The present progressive form is am waiting.
The past progressive form is was waiting.
You need to have something to eat.
You are applying to Mizuno-san's school?
Mizuno-san has good grades, does not she?
He will make up for it with the power of love.
You will never get into Koumei.
You need a standard score over 60.
I mean, I could do it, but...
I am rooting for you, Kota-chan.
The results of the mock exam are in.
English Mathematics Language 3-Subject Exams Science Social Studies 4-Subject Exams 5-Subject Exams
I heard you are applying for Koumei.
My first choice is a public school.
Hello, my son is in Class 3-1...
Thank you very much for having me.
I might not get into the school I want.
You are pushing yourself too hard.
Do not be afraid to rest when things get rough.
It is important to clear your mind, too.
Why do not you try talking to your parents again after things settle down a little?
Can we meet up for Christmas tomorrow, at least for a bit?
It is been a long time since it was just the two of us.
Sorry, I know you are studying.
I thought it might be useful for your club.
It was my first time knitting.
You are studying really hard, are not you?
Are you always up late studying?
I am running out of time.
My mom's against it, so I want to get my grades up and show her,
but it is not working out.
Having your family's support is important, is not it?
At my last meet, my mom left a message in my lunch box saying,
Good work over the past three years.
I realized she would been watching over me the whole time.
Either way, I am just going to have to succeed.
Exams start right after New Year's.
Sorry it did not turn out so great I am glad you liked it, though
And thanks for the handkerchief I will use it at my club
Thanks for meeting up today I feel like I am ready to study again starting tomorrow
I hope we both do well
Akane's getting her result today, right?
You can do it too, Azumi-kun.
But if you fail, you are applying to a municipal high school.
Your mom got called in by your homeroom teacher the other day.
She said you should not try for Koumei with your current grades.
But your mother apparently fought back, saying she wants to give you a chance
since you are trying so hard.
I was just about to bring this upstairs.
Why do not you go back to sleeping earlier and being awake at normal times?
You are putting so much work into this.
What good will it do you if you are not fully awake at the exam?
Do you have your exam ticket?
I wrote down your transfers and departure times.
Do not you dare take the wrong train.
You do not want to be late.
Dazai once said, I must live up to my promise.
That is all that matters to me now.
